TopicTitle: Snapshot of craft when entering Space

Articles.Content:
Hello, im having an issue with my game where whenever i enter space sometimes it takes just a snapshot of the craft and doesnt disappear until i go into the atmosphere of a planet. Could someone help?

Image Of It

Log

Mod List ((I dont know how to get the names with text for all the mods without spending hours sorry!!))
That’s a scatterer bug, try going back to scatterer v0.0723 as it doesn’t seem to happen with that one.
